thread.title: Kimberley Walsh congratulates sister Amy on engagement – and reveals she played matchmaker
thread.title_full: Kimberley Walsh congratulates sister Amy on engagement – and reveals she played matchmaker

title: Kimberley Walsh congratulates sister Amy on engagement – and reveals she played matchmaker
text:
Kimberley Walsh congratulates sister Amy on engagement – and reveals she played matchmaker February 20, 2017 by Ainhoa Barcelona Kimberley Walsh has congratulated her younger sister Amy on her engagement to Bradley Jaden, she writes in her HELLO! Online blog Leave a comment 
Her matchmaking skills paid off! Kimberley Walsh has congratulated her younger sister Amy on her engagement to boyfriend Bradley Jaden. The singer has revealed that she set up the couple more than five years ago, and is so happy that they'll be getting married. In her latest HELLO! Online blog , Kimberley wrote: "Congrats to my little sister Amy who announced her engagement to Bradley Jaden last week. Bradley was an understudy at Shrek The Musical when I played Princess Fiona in musical five years ago and I actually played Cilla and introduced them at my 30th birthday party. It's amazing to think that five years later they're engaged. I'm so happy for them!" 
Exclusive: Kimberley and sisters attend singer's hen do 
Amy and her older sister Kimberley are incredibly close. The actress, who plays Tracy Metcalfe in Emmerdale , was recently on hand to help at an exclusive HELLO! magazine photoshoot, where Kimberley and her husband Justin Scott were introducing their newborn son Cole. In a previous blog post, Kimberley wrote: "My younger sister Amy had a rare week off from filming Emmerdale so she came over to help with the boys. She's amazing with babies and is like a child's entertainer for Bobs, he thinks she's hilarious.
